summary: Tayim offers a modern Middle Eastern dining experience in the heart of The Rocks. Set in a heritage sandstone building, it combines traditional flavors with contemporary Australian cuisine.

details.heading: Tayim
details.content:
Tayim blends Middle Eastern traditions with modern Australian cuisine in a historic setting.

  • Modern Middle Eastern cuisine
  • Heritage sandstone building
  • Intimate dining atmosphere

Explore their menu on the official website.
